content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5) 
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- Small electric poles (various positions for power distribution)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0)
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to connection issues
- Ensure that there are no obstructions (like pipes) when attempting to connect the offshore pump to the boiler and steam engine. Check the surrounding area for any misplaced objects.
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect are within the correct range and orientation for connection.

### Errors when using electric networks
- Make sure that all electric poles are properly connected to the electric network. If any pole is not connected, it can lead to entities being unpowered.
- Check the status of the electric network and ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to it.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. If the tile is occupied, you will need to remove the existing entity first.
